name: Purge Database
description: Attempts to shrink the Synapse database, useful if the purge media tool isn't reclaiming enough space.

spec.question_description: This decides how aggressively your database will be purged. It also allows you to run the final shrink action, when you're ready to experience downtime.
spec.choices:
No local users [recommended]
Number of users [slower]
Number of events [slower]
Skip purging rooms [faster]
Perform final shrink

spec.question_description: The number of users or events used to select rooms for purging, rooms with more users or events then this value will be purged.
The date that rooms will be purged too, the date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format. (Eg: 2020-06-01)
